thread.title: Mr David Devlin
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Mr David Devlin

author: Mr David Devlin
title: Mr David Devlin
text:
As a returning customer I had an expectation that needed to be met and I'm glad to say that this time didn't disappoint either!
So convenient to book online, contacted an appropriate amount of times (via email, text and a courtesy call from the garage to specify time of pick up) before the day.
I had booked an MOT and full service which cost around 60% less than any other garage I had looked at. It was a local garage that was used and they came to collect the car and dropped it off after.
I had some work that was needed to pass the MOT. I was contacted with a costing, I authorised them to do the work. A payment link was sent via email within 5 minutes and I securely paid the amount. The car was dropped off at the agreed time.
Yet again, I'm very happy with Servicing Stop.
